remarks: The projective map of a Hilbert lattice is one-to-one.  Part of Theorem 15.5 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 62.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.)
statement:
pmap11.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmap11.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmap11 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( M ` X ) = ( M ` Y ) <-> X = Y ) ) $.
